thread.title: Kylie Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian ask for prayers on Lamar Odom's behalf as he remains hospitalised - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian ask for prayers on Lamar Odom's behalf as he remains hospitalised - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Kylie Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian ask for prayers on Lamar Odom's behalf as he remains hospitalised - Showbiz
text: Kylie Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian are asking their millions of Instagram followers to pray on behalf of sibling Khloé Kardashian's ex-husband Lamar Odom.Odom remains in a critical condition and breathing with the aid of machines at a Las Vegas hospital, having reportedly been found unconscious at a brothel. © WENN Kardashian family members Rob Kardashian and Kendall Jenner have used social media to rally on Odom's behalf, and now two more siblings are doing the same.Kourtney and Kylie both used their Instagram accounts today to ask for prayers and well-wishes on Odom's behalf. Believing in the power of prayer for this beautiful soul.A photo posted by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Oct 15, 2015 at 10:52am PDTKourtney posted a picture of the NBA star with the caption: "Believing in the power of prayer for this beautiful soul."Kylie appealed directly to her former brother-in-law, writing: "Let's dance again together soon. Prayers up for Lamar please." Let's dance again together soon. Prayers up for Lamar please.A photo posted by King Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Oct 15, 2015 at 9:27am PDTThe Nye County Sheriff stated yesterday (October 14) that Odom was using cocaine and sexual performance enhancing supplements on the weekend before his hospitalisation.Kardashian and Odom separated in 2013 after four years of marriage, with their divorce finalised this year.
